name: Loot, Ghosts, and Cannonballs
description:
Make a name for yourself as the best pirate to ever sail the PCG seas
Collect treasure, cannonballs, barrels, and captives. Bury your treasure at islands and collect captives at port for ransom

Arrow Keys - Steer Ship / Increase Speed / Decrease Speed
Z - Fire left side
X - Fire right side

Song is a MIDI of "Up is Down" from PotC: At World's End
